datasets.title: Global Surface Temperature Anomalies
datasets.description: Monthly and annual global surface temperature anomalies relative to the 1901-2000 baseline average.

datasets.title: U.S. Greenhouse Gas Emissions Inventory
datasets.description: Annual estimates of U.S. anthropogenic greenhouse gas emissions by source and economic sector from 1990 to present.

datasets.title: Sea Level Rise Projections by Coastal County
datasets.description: Projected sea level rise scenarios through 2100 for all U.S. coastal counties under multiple climate models.

datasets.title: National Climate Assessment Indicators
datasets.description: Key indicators tracked by the National Climate Assessment including temperature extremes, precipitation, and drought indices.

datasets.title: Renewable Energy Generation by State
datasets.description: Monthly electricity generation from renewable sources including solar, wind, hydroelectric, and geothermal by state.
